attributes.action: Declare your vote of no confidence in this Labour Government
attributes.additional_details: It is clear that the government are not implementing their manifesto, the consequences of their current policies will make matters worse and conclude in civil unrest unless they either change path dramatically or call an election.
attributes.background: I want this government to know that a large body of people have no confidence in them and they should call a general election or take action to act in the spirit of the wishes of the electorate.

rejection.details:
We also can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
